registrationmadness

Class Section

  • java.lang.Object
    • registrationmadness.Section

  • public class Section
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent class sections. Each section has a course number, time (morning or afternoon), a roster of up to 25 students, and a waitlist of unlimited size.
    Version:
    Spring 2013
    Author:
    Michael McLaughlin, mvm@cis.upenn.edu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Section(int course, boolean morning)
      Constructor for the section.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Returns true if the other object is a section with the same course number and same time period as this object.
      boolean inquire()
      Returns whether or not there's still room in the section.
      boolean register(Student student)
      Registers a student in the section.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string representation of the section.
      void withdraw(Student student)
      Withdraws a student from a section or its waitlist.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Section

        public Section(int course,
       boolean morning)
        Constructor for the section. Creates a section with a course number and a time (morning or afternoon). Each section can have up to 25 students registered and unlimited students on the waitlist.
        Parameters:
        course - The course number of this section.
        morning - True if this is a morning section, false if afternoon.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of the section. Uses the format: courseNumber timePeriod e.g. 101 Morning 107 Afternoon
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The string representation of this section.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Returns true if the other object is a section with the same course number and same time period as this object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to test for equality.
        Returns:
        True if the object is equal to this one.

      • inquire

        public boolean inquire()
        Returns whether or not there's still room in the section.
        Returns:
        True if less than 25 students are registered for the section.

      • register

        public boolean register(Student student)
        Registers a student in the section. If there is no room left in the section, the student is waitlisted for this section.
        Parameters:
        student - The student to register in the section.
        Returns:
        True if the student is registered in the section, false if the student is waitlisted.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(Student student)
        Withdraws a student from a section or its waitlist. If there are other students on the waitlist and this student is removed from the roster, the section attempts to add students from the waitlist until the spot is filled.
        Parameters:
        student - The student to withdraw from the section.
